title: Item Page Set Up.
body: Is Riot going to put that create your item pages in shop.? into the collection and if so when ?

replies.body:
Custom item sets are still being worked out for the updated client. You may not be able to create custom sets in the updated client quite yet, but you are still able to use them! You can find more information on our [Updated Client Features](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ#h2q1) page.

Let me know if you've got any other questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ym5OBViK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-12T03:42:06.878+0000)
>
> Custom item sets are still being worked out for the updated client. You may not be able to create custom sets in the updated client quite yet, but you are still able to use them! You can find more information on our [Updated Client Features](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ#h2q1) page.
> 
> Let me know if you've got any other questions!

Im happy that the new client is going to have Item Sets. Are the ones created with  the old client still going to be available on the new?
Since custom item sets are still being worked out for the updated client, I'm not 100% sure on the details of how it will work. I do know that it's being worked on though!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ym5OBViK,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-13T20:29:47.038+0000)
>
> Since custom item sets are still being worked out for the updated client, I'm not 100% sure on the details of how it will work. I do know that it's being worked on though!

Ok thank you anyway!
